org.opt4j.benchmarks.queens

Class QueensBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opt4j.benchmarks.queens.QueensBoard

  • public class QueensBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    A QueensBoard represents a chessboard with a given side length on which with queens can be placed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QueensBoard(int size)
      Constructs a board with the side length size.
